name: Trimmer - Damage Modifier
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ An Energy Core ( ie : #L "Charged Energy Core" "249646" ) #L "Trimmer Casing" "154938" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Energy Core + Trimmer Casing = Trimmer - Damage Modifier ( ie : #L "Trimmer - Energy Damage Modifier" "249110" ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Charged Energy Core" "249646" - #L "Trimmer - Energy Damage Modifier" "249110" #L "Heated Energy Core" "249647" - #L "Trimmer - Fire Damage Modifier" "249109" #L "Cooled Energy Core" "249648" - #L "Trimmer - Cold Damage Modifier" "249107" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Supercharged Trimmers for players with Ai Expansion.
